author: Harry
title: Lousy Weather
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Harry The Cards will need every bit of that running game today. Temps look to be in the 40s with possible snow flurries. This will test the Cards mettle as well. The Cards get their break with Big Ben out and Super Bowl contenders must take advantage of breaks. The Cards should win today, but they've got to be tougher than they were in the Rams game. This will be trench warfare! Yeah, I mean, I have to switch from shorts to pants for the game. Damn!
